description: Comprehensive MariaDB Performance Monitoring Dashboard with DBRE metrics using mariadb_exporter.

panels.description:
**Goal**: Identify MariaDB version
**Action**: Ensure compatibility and plan upgrades
panels.title: Version

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor database uptime
**Action**: Track restarts and availability
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor peak connection usage
**Action**: Increase max_connections if approaching limit
panels.title: Max Connections

panels.description:
**Goal**: Verify configured buffer pool size
**Action**: Should be 70-80% of available RAM for InnoDB-only workloads
panels.title: InnoDB Buffer Pool Size

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor buffer pool as percentage of total system memory
**Action**: Should be 70-80% of available RAM for dedicated InnoDB servers
panels.title: InnoDB Buffer Pool %

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor connection rate
**Action**: High rate may indicate connection pooling issues
panels.title: Connections

panels.description:
**Goal**: Track active connections
**Action**: Compare with max_connections to avoid saturation
panels.title: Threads

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor actively executing queries
**Action**: Spikes indicate query backlog or slow queries
panels.title: Running Threads

panels.description:
**Goal**: Detect connection problems
**Action**: Investigate network issues, authentication failures, or client crashes
panels.title: Aborted Connections

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor connection rejections
**Action**: Increase max_connections or investigate server overload
panels.title: Connection Errors

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor query throughput
**Action**: Queries include replication; Questions are client-only
panels.title: Query Rate (Queries vs Questions)

panels.description:
**Goal**: Identify slow query patterns
**Action**: Optimize queries exceeding long_query_time threshold
panels.title: Slow Queries

panels.description:
**Goal**: Analyze SELECT execution patterns
**Action**: High select_scan or select_full_join indicates missing indexes
panels.title: SELECT Operations

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor sorting activity
**Action**: High values may indicate need for larger sort_buffer_size
panels.title: Sort Operations

panels.description:
**Goal**: Detect multi-pass sorts
**Action**: Increase sort_buffer_size if value is high
panels.title: Sort Merge Passes

panels.description:
**Goal**: Compare index reads vs table scans
**Action**: handler_read_rnd_next should be low; high values = missing indexes
panels.title: Handler Reads (Index vs Table Scan)

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor DML operation rates
**Action**: Track insert/update/delete patterns
panels.title: Handler Write Operations

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor temp table creation rate
**Action**: High rate indicates complex queries or missing indexes
panels.title: Temporary Tables Created

panels.description:
**Goal**: Detect temp tables spilling to disk
**Action**: Increase tmp_table_size and max_heap_table_size
panels.title: Temporary Tables on Disk

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor temp file creation
**Action**: High values indicate insufficient tmpdir space or large sorts
panels.title: Temporary Files

panels.description:
**Goal**: Maintain >95% hit rate
**Action**: Increase table_open_cache if hit rate is low
panels.title: Table Cache Hit Rate

panels.description:
**Goal**: Maintain >99% hit rate
**Action**: Increase thread_cache_size if frequently creating threads
panels.title: Thread Cache Hit Rate

panels.description:
**Goal**: Maintain >99% hit rate for MyISAM
**Action**: Increase key_buffer_size if hit rate is low
panels.title: Key Buffer Hit Rate (MyISAM)

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor buffer pool page distribution
**Action**: Ensure adequate free pages; dirty pages flushed regularly
panels.title: Buffer Pool Pages

panels.description:
**Goal**: Maintain >99% hit rate
**Action**: Increase innodb_buffer_pool_size if hit rate drops
panels.title: Buffer Pool Hit Rate

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor read-ahead efficiency
**Action**: High eviction rate indicates ineffective read-ahead
panels.title: Buffer Pool Read-Ahead

panels.description:
**Goal**: Should be zero or near-zero
**Action**: Non-zero indicates buffer pool is too small or flush is too slow
panels.title: Buffer Pool Wait Free

panels.description:
**Goal**: Understand workload patterns
**Action**: Track read vs write ratios for capacity planning

targets.expr: rate(mariadb_innodb_rows_read{job="$job", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or rate(mariadb_innodb_rows_inserted{job="$job", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or rate(mariadb_innodb_rows_updated{job="$job", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or rate(mariadb_innodb_rows_deleted{job="$job", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])

panels.title: InnoDB Row Operations

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor I/O bandwidth
**Action**: High I/O indicates need for more RAM or faster disks
panels.title: InnoDB Data I/O

panels.description:
**Goal**: Track I/O operation counts
**Action**: Compare with data bytes to understand I/O patterns
panels.title: InnoDB Data Reads/Writes

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor fsync frequency
**Action**: High fsync rate impacts write performance
panels.title: InnoDB Data Fsyncs

panels.description:
**Goal**: Minimize deadlocks (should be near zero)
**Action**: Review transaction logic and add proper indexes
panels.title: InnoDB Deadlocks

panels.description:
**Goal**: Minimize lock timeouts
**Action**: Optimize queries and reduce transaction duration
panels.title: InnoDB Lock Timeouts

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor lock contention
**Action**: High waits indicate transaction conflicts or long-running transactions
panels.title: InnoDB Row Lock Waits

panels.description:
**Goal**: Minimize time spent waiting for locks
**Action**: Optimize transactions to hold locks for shorter periods
panels.title: InnoDB Row Lock Time

panels.description:
**Goal**: Keep history list short (<1000)
**Action**: Long list indicates old MVCC versions; check for long-running transactions
panels.title: InnoDB History List Length

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor redo log write rate
**Action**: Size redo logs appropriately for workload
panels.title: InnoDB Log Written

panels.description:
**Goal**: Minimize log waits (should be zero)
**Action**: Log waits indicate redo log is too small
panels.title: InnoDB Log Waits & Fsyncs

panels.description:
**Goal**: Keep pending operations low
**Action**: High pending ops indicate I/O bottleneck
panels.title: InnoDB Log Pending Operations

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor log write efficiency
**Action**: Ratio of actual writes vs write requests
panels.title: InnoDB Log Write Ratio

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor network bandwidth usage
**Action**: Track patterns for capacity planning and detect anomalies
panels.title: Network Traffic

panels.description:
**Goal**: Minimize table lock waits
**Action**: Convert MyISAM tables to InnoDB for row-level locking
panels.title: Table Locks

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor exporter CPU usage (normalized)
**Action**: Should be minimal; high usage indicates collection issues
panels.title: Exporter Process CPU Usage

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor memory consumption
**Action**: Track RSS (resident) and VSZ (virtual) memory
panels.title: Exporter Memory Usage

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor file descriptor usage
**Action**: Ensure not approaching system limits
panels.title: Open File Descriptors

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor collector success/failure
**Action**: Investigate failures (0 values)
panels.title: Collector Health Timeline

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor collection performance
**Action**: Slow scrapes may indicate database issues
panels.title: Collector Scrape Duration

panels.description:
**Goal**: Detect stale metrics
**Action**: High values indicate scraping stopped
panels.title: Time Since Last Scrape

panels.description:
**Goal**: Monitor metric cardinality
**Action**: Sudden increases may indicate label explosion
panels.title: Total Metrics Exported

panels.description:
**Goal**: Track exporter restarts
**Action**: Frequent restarts indicate stability issues
panels.title: Exporter Uptime

panels.description:
**Goal**: Identify exporter version
**Action**: Keep updated for latest features and fixes
panels.title: Exporter Version

title: MariaDB Comprehensive Dashboard
